cohort_profile.system_prompt: You are an expert RTO training and assessment strategist specializing in Australian VET compliance and ASQA standards. Generate cohort profile content that meets Clauses 1.1-1.3 requirements.
cohort_profile.user_prompt_template:
Create a comprehensive cohort profile section for {qualification_code} - {qualification_title}. This is a {aqf_level} qualification in the {industry_sector} industry. Include:

1. Target student demographics and characteristics
2. Entry requirements and prerequisites
3. Language, literacy and numeracy (LLN) considerations
4. Support services available
5. Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) pathways
6. Student support mechanisms

Ensure compliance with ASQA Clause 1.3 regarding learner characteristics and Clause 1.1 regarding training and assessment strategies.

delivery_model.system_prompt: You are an expert in vocational education delivery methods and ASQA compliance. Generate delivery model content that demonstrates compliance with Clauses 1.1, 1.8, and 1.13-1.16.
delivery_model.user_prompt_template:
Create a detailed delivery model section for {qualification_code} - {qualification_title}. Include:

1. Mode of delivery (classroom, online, blended, workplace)
2. Delivery schedule and duration
3. Training facilities and resources required
4. Equipment and materials needed
5. Class sizes and trainer-to-student ratios
6. Flexible delivery options
7. Work placement arrangements (if applicable)

The qualification has {nominal_hours} nominal hours and includes {unit_count} units. Ensure the delivery model is realistic, adequately resourced, and meets ASQA Standards.

assessment_overview.system_prompt: You are an expert in VET assessment principles and practices. Generate assessment strategy content that demonstrates the principles of assessment and rules of evidence per ASQA Standards.
assessment_overview.user_prompt_template:
Create a comprehensive assessment overview for {qualification_code} - {qualification_title}. Include:

1. Assessment principles (validity, reliability, flexibility, fairness)
2. Rules of evidence (validity, sufficiency, authenticity, currency)
3. Assessment methods used across the qualification
4. Assessment instruments and tools
5. Assessment scheduling and timing
6. Reasonable adjustment procedures
7. Assessment validation processes
8. Feedback mechanisms
9. Reassessment policies

The qualification includes {unit_count} units with a mix of knowledge and practical assessments. Ensure compliance with Clause 1.8 regarding assessment systems.

unit_clustering.system_prompt: You are an expert in pedagogical sequencing and unit clustering for VET qualifications. Generate clustering strategies that support logical learning progressions.
unit_clustering.user_prompt_template:
Create a unit clustering and sequencing strategy for {qualification_code} - {qualification_title}. The qualification contains these units:

{unit_list}

Provide:

1. Recommended clusters of units that naturally group together
2. Pedagogical rationale for each cluster
3. Suggested delivery sequence
4. Prerequisites and co-requisites between units
5. Estimated timeframes for each cluster
6. Assessment opportunities across clustered units

Ensure the clustering supports efficient delivery while maintaining learning integrity and allowing for integrated assessment.

trainer_requirements.system_prompt: You are an expert in VET trainer and assessor requirements under ASQA Standards. Generate content that demonstrates compliance with Clause 1.13-1.16.
trainer_requirements.user_prompt_template:
Create a trainer and assessor requirements section for {qualification_code} - {qualification_title} in the {industry_sector} industry. Include:

1. Vocational competency requirements (TAE40116 or equivalent)
2. Industry currency and professional development requirements
3. Required industry experience and qualifications
4. Trainer-to-student ratio requirements
5. Specialized skills or registrations needed
6. Professional development plan for trainers
7. Industry engagement activities

Ensure compliance with ASQA Clauses 1.13-1.16 regarding trainer and assessor requirements.

resources_and_equipment.system_prompt: You are an expert in VET training resources and facilities. Generate comprehensive resource lists that ensure adequate training delivery.
resources_and_equipment.user_prompt_template:
Create a detailed resources and equipment section for {qualification_code} - {qualification_title}. Include:

1. Physical resources and equipment required
2. Technology and software needs
3. Learning materials and textbooks
4. Consumables and materials
5. Facility requirements (workshop, classroom, lab)
6. Health and safety equipment
7. Industry-standard tools and equipment
8. Budget considerations

For a {industry_sector} qualification with {student_cohort_size} students. Ensure resources meet industry standards and ASQA requirements.

quality_assurance.system_prompt: You are an expert in VET quality assurance and continuous improvement. Generate content that demonstrates systematic quality management.
quality_assurance.user_prompt_template:
Create a quality assurance and continuous improvement section for {qualification_code}. Include:

1. Validation schedule and methodology
2. Moderation processes and frequency
3. Feedback collection mechanisms (learner, industry, employer)
4. Review and improvement cycles
5. Key performance indicators
6. Staff professional development requirements
7. Documentation and record-keeping
8. Complaint and appeals procedures
9. Industry engagement for currency

Ensure alignment with ASQA Standards for continuous improvement (Standard 1.8, 2.2).

aqf_levels.certificate_i: Certificate I: Introductory skills and knowledge for work, community involvement and/or further learning
aqf_levels.certificate_ii: Certificate II: Basic factual, technical and procedural knowledge of a defined area of work and learning
aqf_levels.certificate_iii: Certificate III: Factual, technical, procedural and some theoretical knowledge of a defined area of work and learning
aqf_levels.certificate_iv: Certificate IV: Broad factual, technical and some theoretical knowledge of a specific area or broad field of work and learning
aqf_levels.diploma: Diploma: Broad and some specialised technical and theoretical knowledge of a specific discipline or interdisciplinary area
aqf_levels.advanced_diploma: Advanced Diploma: Broad and deep technical and theoretical knowledge in one or more disciplines or areas of practice
aqf_levels.graduate_certificate: Graduate Certificate: Broad and coherent body of knowledge in one or more disciplines or areas of practice
aqf_levels.graduate_diploma: Graduate Diploma: Broad and deep knowledge in one or more disciplines or areas of practice

asqa_clauses.clause_1_1: RTOs develop and implement strategies for training and assessment that meet the requirements of training packages and VET accredited courses
asqa_clauses.clause_1_3: The RTO ensures that all trainers and assessors undertaking assessment of competence hold the assessment credential
asqa_clauses.clause_1_8: The RTO implements an assessment system that ensures valid, reliable, fair and flexible assessment
asqa_clauses.clause_1_13: Trainers and assessors hold vocational competencies at least to the level being delivered
asqa_clauses.clause_2_2: The RTO systematically monitors quality of training and assessment services

global_context.tone_guidelines: Professional, compliant, specific to Australian VET context, evidence-based, practical and implementable
